description:
My place is close to Central Park, the American Museum of Natural History, two train lines, and restaurants & bars on Amsterdam Ave. You’ll love my place because of the location, the coziness, and the quintessential New York exposed brick.. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

There is a quarter washer and dryer in the basement.
name: Cozy, exposed brick studio on the UWS
review: Very accurate description. Amazing location on the upper west side. Definitely a great value compared to other listings in that area. Lauralea had a nice welcome package of refreshments and snacks which was a very nice added touch. Very clean place. Overall a great find!
